php.LBL_PASSWORD_DESCRIPTION: Setati complexitatea parolei pentru utilizatorii softului CRM
php.Uppercase letters from A to Z: Litere mari de la A la Z
php.Lowercase letters a to z: Litere mici de la a la z
php.Password should contain special characte: Parola trebuie sa contina caractere speciale
php.LBL_PASSWORD_COMPLEXITY_INFO: Specify how complex user passwords should be. The system will force creating secure passwords and in line with your guidelines.
php.LBL_PASSWORD_PWNED_INFO: In order to increase security, you can enable the verification of passwords in the stolen passwords database. If a password is found, the system will not allow this password to be used.
php.LBL_CHECK_PWNED_PASSWORD: The password cannot be in the stolen passwords database
php.LBL_ALERT_PWNED_PASSWORD: Password appears %s times in the stolen passwords database
php.LBL_PASSWORD_CHANGE_TIME_DESC: 0 - fara limitare, 356 - an, 30 - luna. Dupa aceasta perioada, de fiecare data cand un utilizator se conecteaza, sistemul va afisa un mesaj pentru a schimba o parola.
php.LBL_TIME_TO_CHANGE_PASSWORD_DESC: Dupa aceasta perioada, contul va fi blocat si utilizatorul nu va putea sa se autentifice in sistem.
php.LBL_REGISTER_ENCRYPTION: Modificarile introduse vor fi executate de cron
php.LBL_ENCRYPTION_CRON_BATCH_METHODS: Cron "System batch methods" nu este activ. Acest cron este necesar pentru ca mecanismul de criptare a parolei sa functioneze corect.
php.LBL_PASSWORD_SETTING_WARNING: Utilizatorii cu parole mai vechi decat cei specificati in domeniu pot pierde abilitatea de a se conecta. Este foarte recomandat sa resetati parolele inainte de a efectua modificari.
php.LBL_ENCRYPT_DESCRIPTION: The encryption mechanism in the system is used to encrypt sensitive data in the database. In order to enable encryption you have to define the method of encryption and password from the user interface level, and a second password that can be found in the \config\SecurityKeys.php file. These parameters are required to decrypt the data.
php.LBL_TIME_TO_CHECK_PWNED: How often to check during login if the password is in the stolen passwords database (days)
php.LBL_NO_REGISTER_ENCRYPTION: Encryption using this method is not supported by the system
